ygData.subject: Re: What i have to put up with
ygData.msgSnippet: First off.. you guys are still low lvls.. and everybody does pretty much the same dmg... clerics, wiz, shamans, mages.. no real big difference.  But at higher
ygData.messageBody:
First off.. you guys are still low lvls.. and everybody does pretty much the
same dmg... clerics, wiz, shamans, mages.. no real big difference. But at
higher lvls us wizards there are no equal. At 24 you get a 200dmg DD. at
30 you get one that does 300dmg plus stuns. Shamans are weak healers, weak
fighters, and weak nukers at high lvls. At high lvls, everybody will ahve
journeyman's boots or the new Rings of Running (please don't ask me about
them, i do'nt know enough info to really talk about them), so they're SoW
will be useless. Plus, us wiz get teleportation and plane travelling spells
that no other class except the druid has. Believe me, at lvl 30+ certain
classes are pretty much useless.. shamans and mages come to mind (pets are
crap and their attack spells are crap.. nobody likes the pet eating the exp.
either). Tell your shaman friend about the group portals, evacuation, and
plane portal spells he will never have.

>
>
>I'm a level 11 wizard about to turn 12. Well my friend is a shaman who
>just
>turned 14. Well he just brought
>his new damage spell and he said it does 77 damage, to which i replied kewl
>my next spell does that amount
>too. That was a mistake he started laughing and saying things like "why
>would anyone want to play the wizard
>when they can play the shaman". "the shaman can stand toe to toe like the
>warrior and do the same damage
>as the wizard, Ha HA HA HA ....." . Then he went on saying crap like now he
>knows the shaman is the best
>class in the game. All he could talk about before was the sow spell, and
>now
>it is he does the same damage
>as the wizard. My question is this, i thought i picked the wizard so i
>would not have to hear stuff like this?
>I thought level 12 was when the wizard started to leave other mage class
>behind. Know i have to hear alot
>aggraviating crap from this shaman, laughing at the wizard class. Dam that
>is going to suck. Someone
>please tell me there is hope out there as far as the damage spells go.
